snippet: With Rafael Soriano, Nick Swisher and Hiroki Kuroda all declining the team’s one-year, $13.3 million offer, the Yankees will now begin to determine which of the three players, if any, will come back.
abstract: New York Yankees free agents Rafael Soriano, Nick Swisher and Hiroki Kuroda all decline one-year, $13.3 million offer to stay put, leaving Yankees to decide which of three players, if any, will return.
lead_paragraph: With Rafael Soriano, Nick Swisher and Hiroki Kuroda all declining the team’s one-year, $13.3 million offer, the Yankees will now begin to determine which of the three players, if any, will come back.

headline.seo: Yankees’ Rafael Soriano, Nick Swisher and Hiroki Kuroda Turn Down Qualifying Offers
headline.main: No Surprise: 3 Yankees Turn Down 1-Year Offers
headline.print_headline: No Surprise: 3 Yankees Turn Down 1-Year Offers
